channel.title: Couple of problems
channel.description:
I have a couple of issues I need help with:
1) Currently I'm running DDSSPECED V3 and I'm having an issue using the 'offer x' and withdraw 'x' commands in the trade screens, and in the banks. What is my issue with that. Could someone post a working packet or w/e they are with how to fix this issue?
2) I've just realized magic doesn't work. (normal spells and I'm assuming others (i'll test in a minute) don't work either.) How would I code in the magic? I'm assuming I'm just missing a file, or a method or something. Can someone point me towards a guide, or a way of adding it?
3) On DDSSPECED V3 you get an opening interface. You can edit the one line that was there originally, but that one line is about 3/4 down the interface and I'd like to move the text further up. I tried changing the 'sendquest' number or w/e to a number a bit higher (for instance, 11134 to 11133) and it doesn't change anything. Any ideas?
4) Last but not least, what would you look for in a server?
Nobody helps anymore. :(

item.title: Couple of problems
item.dc:creator: @Ardy3231 Ardy3231
item.description:
@Ardy3231 wrote:

I have a couple of issues I need help with:

  1. Currently I’m running DDSSPECED V3 and I’m having an issue using the ‘offer x’ and withdraw ‘x’ commands in the trade screens, and in the banks. What is my issue with that. Could someone post a working packet or w/e they are with how to fix this issue?

  2. I’ve just realized magic doesn’t work. (normal spells and I’m assuming others (i’ll test in a minute) don’t work either.) How would I code in the magic? I’m assuming I’m just missing a file, or a method or something. Can someone point me towards a guide, or a way of adding it?

  3. On DDSSPECED V3 you get an opening interface. You can edit the one line that was there originally, but that one line is about 3/4 down the interface and I’d like to move the text further up. I tried changing the ‘sendquest’ number or w/e to a number a bit higher (for instance, 11134 to 11133) and it doesn’t change anything. Any ideas?

  4. Last but not least, what would you look for in a server?

Nobody helps anymore.
